text: Dangshi, ni dui an la ciguo enhui [yindao ta xinfeng yisilan jiao], ni ye shiguo enhui [shi nu] de ren [zai de•ben•hali si——mu sheng de shi nu] shuo:“Ni dang wanliu ni de qizi, dang jingwei an la.” Ni ba an la suo zhaoshi de yincang zai xinzhong er weiju renmen, qishi, an la cai shi zui zhide ni weiju de. Dang zai de yu ta lihun shi, wo shi ta yu ni jiehun, yibian xinshimen [jianglai] yu tamen de yi zi suo liyi de qi zi jiehun shi bu zai fannan. An la de mingling shi bixu zhixing de.
